org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.renderer

Interface RendererPlugin

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PageViewTool
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasePageViewTool, ContentHighlightRendererPlugin, ContentSelectionRendererPlugin, EditOutlineTool, PageContentRendererPlugin, RectangleTool, SelectionFocusRendererPlugin

    public interface RendererPlugin
    Interface for page renderer plug-ins that represent a rendering layer.
    Author:
    clc

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enable(boolean enable)
      Enables or disables the plug-in.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Returns true if the plug-in is enabled, false otherwise.
      void render(PageRenderer renderer)
      Draws the layer
